  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3065</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3065</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Literatura. Animals, però savis</string>
            <string language="en">Literature. Animals, but wise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur. Tiere, aber kluges</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Littérature. Animaux, mais sage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Literatura. Animais, mas sábio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Letteratura. Animali, ma saggio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λογοτεχνία. Ζώα, αλλά σοφός</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recurs interactiu que tracta el tema de les faules i dels autors de la literatura universal que han escrit en aquest gènere didàctic. S'hi estudia la literatura grecollatina, la Il·lustració i el Neoclassicisme, moments on els faulistes van conrear amb èxit les faules. Textos de: Ísop, Fedre i La Fontaine. Activitats d'autoavaluació per a la pràctica dels continguts de la unitat.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive resource on fables and universal writers in this exemplary genre. It includes Greek and Latin literature, the Enlightenment and Neoclassicism, times when fabulists were popular. Texts by Aesop, Phaedrus and La Fontaine. Self-assessment activities are also included for practice.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">literatura comparada</string>
            <string language="en">comparative literature</string>
            <string language="es">literatura comparada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gènere literari</string>
            <string language="en">literary genre</string>
            <string language="es">género literario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">literatura</string>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
            <string language="es">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió lectora</string>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktives Hilfsmittel auf Fabeln und 
Universalverfassern in diesem mustergültigen Genren. Es 
enthält griechische und lateinische Literatur, die Aufklärung und 
Neoclassicism, Zeiten, als fabulists populär waren. Texte durch
Aesop, Phaedrus und La Fontaine. Selbstbewertung Aktivitäten 
sind auch für Praxis eingeschlossen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource interactive sur des fables et des 
auteurs universels dans ce genre exemplaire. Il inclut la 
littérature grecque et latine, l'éclaircissement et Neoclassicism, 
des périodes où les fabulistes étaient populaires. Textes 
par Aesop, Phaedrus et La Fontaine. Des activités de 
art de l'auto-portrait-assessment sont également incluses pour la pratique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso interativo em fables e em escritores 
universais neste genre exemplary. Inclui a literatura grega e 
latin, o enlightenment e Neoclassicism, as épocas em que os fabulists
eram populares. Textos por Aesop, por Phaedrus e por la 
Fontaine. As atividades do self-assessment são incluídas 
também para a prática.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa interattiva sui fables e sui produttori 
universali in questo genere esemplare. Include la 
letteratura greca e latina, il chiarimento e Neoclassicism, periodi in
cui i fabulists erano popolari. Testi da Aesop, da Phaedrus e da
La Fontaine. Le attività di valutazione di se stesso egualmente
sono incluse per pratica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικό στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς στους μύθους και 
καθολικοί συγγραφείς σε αυτό το υποδειγματικό ύφος. 
Περιλαμβάνει την ελληνική και λατινική λογοτεχνία, το 
Διαφωτισμό και το Neoclassicism, χρόνοι όταν fabulists ήταν 
δημοφιλείς. Κείμενα από Αίσωπο, Phaedrus και το Λα 
Fontaine. Οι δραστηριότητες αυτοαξιολόγησης 
συμπεριλαμβάνονται επίσης για την πρακτική.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literaturwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">literarisches Genre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
